FacileViz 0.1.10
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

aes_map() `aes_map<-`()

Set and retrieve mappings for facile objects.

analysis_result()

Extract a FacileAnalysisResult from something

create_color_map()

Map values to colors.

create_shape_map()

Maps shapes to categorical values

.search_df_columns()

Fast and loose way to identify which row contains a query across a data.frame

enkey()

Sets the "key" column for a data.frame

fboxplot()

Create an interactive boxplot

fscatterplot()

Draws interactive 2 or 3d scatterplots over data

input_data()

Retrieve the input object from a FacileViz

knit_print(<FacileViz>)

Ensures FacileViz objects are knit properly

maybe_facet()

Drives faceting-like behavior for (internal) plotly-generating functions.

plot_data()

Extracts the data used for plotting

plot_expression()

Plot expression of a gene from a DGEList (this function is not facile)

unify_legend()

Hacks into plotly internals merge legends across subplots.

unselected()

Checks if the return value from a selectInput looks like it's unselected

with_aesthetics()

Utility function used by most plotting functions that returns a data.frame with columns mapping the observations to colors, shape, etc (adds columns for each)

with_color()

Augment a facile object with a color aesthetic
